mapper.insert: INSERT INTO task_templates (id, content_id, num, weighting, task_name, task_cover, creator, create_time, last_modified_user, last_modified_time) VALUES (null, #{contentId}, #{num}, #{weighting}, #{taskName}, #{taskCover}, #{creator}, #{createTime}, #{lastModifiedUser}, #{lastModifiedTime})
mapper.select: SELECT id, content_id, num, weighting, task_name, task_cover FROM `task_templates` WHERE content_id=#{contentId} ORDER BY num
